arts.ttl: Wolves set to sign Reims defender Emmanuel Agbadou for £15m - as Vitor Pereira's side prepare to finally sort out problem position
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Wolves are planning to finalise a £15million deal to sign defender Emmanuel Agbadou from Reims by next week.

arts.ttl: Wolves reach €20m agreement in principle for Reims’ Emmanuel Agbadou
arts.sum: Wolves and Stade de Reims have reached an agreement in principle for the transfer of centre-back Emmanuel Agbadou (27) according to a report this Friday from L’Equipe. The Premier League…

arts.ttl: From France: Wolves reach agreement for the transfer of Emmanuel Agbadou
arts.sum: Update: L’Equipe are now reporting Wolves have reached an agreement in principle to sign Emmanuel Agbadou. The fee is estimated at around €20m, and the transfer has been managed by Jorge Mendes’ Gestifute. According to multiple claims, Wolverhampton Wanderers have stepped up their pursuit for Stade de Reims defender Emmanuel Agbadou. arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: Liam Flin has picked out five teams in action in Europe to include in your weekend acca.

arts.ttl: NAC Breda bring in Belgian right-back Maxime Busi on loan
arts.sum: Maxime Busi (25) has joined NAC Breda on loan from Ligue 1 side Stade de Reims for the rest of the season.

Saint-Etienne saw out 2024 with a four-game losing streak, a record they'll look to right when they face Reims on Saturday. The visitors have lost just once in their last six, though they have won on...

arts.ttl: Wolves could mak €20m bid for Reims’ Emmanuel Agbadou amid Abdukodir Khusanov interest
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers are in the market for at least one centre-back this January. As per Sky Sports, the Midlands club have made RC Lens’ Kevin Danso (26) a priority target. However, other…
